results.name: Moon Curse of the Doppelganger Demo

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3320M CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio
